How to download
===============
Navigate to releases, scroll to the bottom of the newest release and view the assets. You can either download the source code and compile it yourself or use the provided .apk file and install it on your android device. Note: I will always include the .aab file which is not signed, and the .apks file which is a type of file compression. 

Pick Up & Delivery App
======================

Mobile app for Double R Sharpening to manage pick up forms and delivery receipts.

Features
--------

- **Delivery Mode**: View deliveries by route, generate PDF receipts
- **Pickup Mode**: Create and upload pick up forms
- **PDF Generation**: Auto-save receipts to organized folders
- **Company Database**: Store frequent customers and blade types
- **Auto Updates**: Check for app updates from server

How to Use
----------

Delivery Mode
^^^^^^^^^^^^^

1. Select your route from dropdown
2. Tap "Download Route" to get delivery data
3. Navigate with Previous/Next buttons
4. Tap "Print Receipt" to generate PDF
5. PDFs save to: ``Download/PickUpForms/{Route}/{Date}/``

Pickup Mode
^^^^^^^^^^^

1. Select route and company
2. Tap "Add New" to create pick up form
3. Choose description and enter quantity
4. Tap "Upload" to send to server

Settings
^^^^^^^^

- Change app mode (Delivery/Pickup)
- Configure API URLs
- Manage company database
- Check for updates

API Requirements
----------------

- Upload URL: ``https://doublersharpening.com/api/upload_po/``
- Company DB: ``https://doublersharpening.com/api/company_db/``
- Delivery API: ``https://doublersharpening.com/api/delivery_pos/``

PDF Receipt Format
------------------

- Company header with contact info
- Delivery details table
- Blade information (Qty, Description, Services)
- Signature section
- Auto-saved by route and date

Creating the APK
================

Structure
---------

::

    └── mypoapp
        ├── .idea
        └── build
            └── mypoapp
                └── android
                    └── gradle
                        └── app
                            └── build
                                └── outputs
                                    └── apk
                                        └── debug
                                            └── app_debug.apk (This appears after you have built the app)
        ├── dist
        ├── logs
        └── src
            ├── __init__.py
            ├── __main__.py
            ├── app.py
            └── resources
                ├── ic_launcher-web.png (these are the app icons)
                ├── values
                └── xml
                    └── file_paths.xml
        ├── AndroidManifest.custom.html
        ├── CHANGELOGE
        ├── LICENSE
        ├── pyproject.toml
        ├── README.md

The above dependency tree does not include all files, but is for general reference.

Requirements
------------

- toga 0.5.2
- requests 2.28.0
- packaging 21.3
- urllib3 1.26.0
- reportlab 4.0.4

Building the App (Debug Mode)
-----------------------------

.. code-block:: bash

    briefcase create android
    briefcase build android
    briefcase run android
